## ReduxFeatureModule interface

Defines the feature module. The ID identifies the section in the state and is also used to globally discriminate features.

After instantiating a feature store the store will fire an initialization action for that feature. Use [ofInitFeature()](./redux-store.ofinitfeature.md) to register for these initialization actions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ReduxFeatureModule<S, FS = any, Input extends Action = AnyAction, Output extends Input = Input, Dependencies = any> extends ReduxFeatureModuleId<S, FS> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dependencies](./redux-store.reduxfeaturemodule.dependencies.md) | <code>ArrayLike&lt;ReduxFeatureModule&lt;any&gt;&gt;</code> | Dependencies on other modules |
|  [epic](./redux-store.reduxfeaturemodule.epic.md) | <code>Epic&lt;Input, Output, ReduxRootState, Dependencies&gt;</code> | The epic for side effects |
|  [id](./redux-store.reduxfeaturemodule.id.md) | <code>string</code> | ID of the feature module, will also be used as the key to the state |
|  [reducer](./redux-store.reduxfeaturemodule.reducer.md) | <code>Reducer&lt;S&gt;</code> | The reducer for the module. |
